Adriano Bechara de Souza Hobaika

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3933592425513758
  • Última atualização do currículo em 01/06/2015

Graduation in Medicine - Federal University of Minas Gerais (2000) and Master of Science in Medicine - Institute of Education and Research of the Santa Casa de Belo Horizonte (2008). Superior Title in Anesthesiology and Co-Responsible Education and Training Center of the Brazilian Society of Anesthesiology - Santa Casa de Belo Horizonte. Member of the Department of Anesthesiology, Hospital Mater Dei Scientific Committee. Staff Anesthesiologist of Mater Dei Hospital. (Texto informado pelo autor)
